medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Make-up
marks: [昭和五年夏] {Sho_wa gonen natsu} [言人画] {Kotondo ga}
description: later edition; woman seated on a purple, green, orange and blue floral cushion; bare-chested woman wearing pink, white, purple, blue, orange and green floral kimono pulled below her breasts, arranging her hair
